conditionEncounterSearchParameter

Parameter code:reference

Searches for condition based on the condition encounter Uuid eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Condition?encounter={uuid}

ResourceCondition
Expression(none)
Target ResourcesCondition
MultiplesThe parameter cannot repeat or have multiple values

name: conditionEncounterSearchParameter
description: Searches for condition based on the condition encounter Uuid eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Condition?encounter={uuid}
